hero_title: Highly qualified scientific and pedagogical staff of the university provides quality education for students.

announce.desc: Trees are not only among the largest, oldest, and most complex living things on Earth, they also grow extremely slowly — often taking decades or even centuries to reach their full size.....
announce.desc3: The announcements section provides information about meetings, exams, competitions, and other important events at our institute. Essential updates for students and teachers are regularly refreshed.

news.desc: How do you create compelling presentations that wow your colleagues and impress your managers?
news.desc4: Follow the latest news, important events, and announcements of our institute in this section. Up-to-date information for students and teachers is regularly updated.

univer.about_desc: The Uzbek National Pedagogical University is one of the major scientific and educational centers of our country. It has a rich history and established positive traditions. The highly qualified academic staff of the university provides quality education to students.
univer.aim_desc: The main goal of the University is to train highly qualified specialists who are well-rounded, responsible to the state and society, work diligently and honestly for the country’s future, respect national and universal values, and are competitive in the field of international education.
